hero.title: Eureka Automation
hero.subtitle: Pioneering the Future of Production with Engineering Excellence and ISO 9001:2015 Precision

about.title: A Decade of Engineering Precision
about.description: Since 2010, Eureka Automation has been a trusted partner in designing and manufacturing innovative industrial solutions for global leaders in the Automotive and Electronics sectors.
about.comprehensive_services: Our comprehensive services include requirement analysis, mechanical/electrical design, CNC machining, PLC programming, and complete machine assembly.

industrialTrust.title: INDUSTRIAL TRUST
industrialTrust.description: Eureka Automation is a premier System Integrator (SI) specializing in smart manufacturing design. Founded in 2014 as a dedicated automation entity (rooted since 2002), we bridge the gap between mechanical engineering and digital intelligence.

showcase.title: Our Showcase & Activities
showcase.description: Experience our innovations and solutions through real-world demonstration videos.

home.transform_desc: Empower your manufacturing ecosystem with smart, data-driven automation frameworks designed for longevity.

timeline.title: Strategic Evolution
timeline.quote: From a local machine builder to a global automation partner trusted by world-class manufacturers worldwide.

2002.title: Founded as Eureka Design
2002.desc: Began our journey in mechanical engineering and precision machine building

2014.title: Global Expansion
2014.desc: Established Eureka Design India to strengthen international presence

2015.title: Established Eureka Automation
2015.desc: Transformed into a full-service System Integrator with advanced automation solutions

2019.title: Smart Automation Era
2019.desc: Launched AI & Industry Business Unit for next-generation manufacturing

ai_ml.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai_ml.desc: Predictive maintenance and QC systems powered by neural networks.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.desc: ISO-certified manufacturing processes ensuring peak performance.

custom.title: Custom Engineering
custom.desc: Tailored solutions for complex manufacturing challenges.

support.title: Expert Support
support.desc: Full after-sales maintenance and operator training programs.

contact.title: Partnering for Your Success
contact.description: Ready to redefine your production efficiency? Our expert engineering team is prepared to architect the perfect automation strategy for your facility.
contact.support_hours: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM â€“ 6:00 PM.

careers.title: Forge Your Future With Us
careers.subtitle: Join a team of visionaries shaping the future of industrial intelligence. We are seeking passionate innovators to lead the next generation of automation.
careers.apply_desc: Submit your details and we'll get back to you soon.

positions.title: PLC Programmer
positions.desc: Design, program, and commission PLC systems for industrial automation projects.

positions.title: Mechanical Design Engineer
positions.desc: Create detailed 3D designs and engineering drawings for custom-built industrial machines.

positions.title: Full-Stack Developer
positions.desc: Develop internal tools and client-facing dashboards for IIoT and smart factory solutions.

blog.title: Blog & Insights
blog.tag: Stay updated with the latest trends in industrial automation

industry40.title: What is Industrial Automation?
industry40.excerpt: Understanding the role of automation in enhancing modern manufacturing efficiency.

wms.title: Warehouse Management
wms.tag: Optimize your inventory with intelligent software.

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning Solutions
ai.content_desc: Harness the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning for predictive maintenance, quality control optimization, and production forecasting. Our AI solutions transform raw data into actionable insights for smarter decision-making.

robotics.title: Robotics & Automation
robotics.content_desc: Transform your production lines with advanced robotics and automation technologies. We design and implement comprehensive automation systems that increase efficiency, improve quality consistency, and reduce labor costs while maintaining safety standards.

machines.title: Custom Industrial Machines
machines.content_desc: Our custom industrial machines are engineered to meet your specific manufacturing requirements. We combine precision engineering with innovative design to deliver solutions that enhance productivity and reduce operational costs.

logistics.title: Smart Logistics Solutions
logistics.content_desc: Optimize your supply chain with our smart logistics solutions featuring autonomous mobile robots (AMR), automated guided vehicles (AGV), and warehouse management systems (WMS). Streamline material handling, reduce errors, and increase throughput across your operations.
